channel.title: New Server (Recruiting Staff!) Help needed
channel.description:
Ok I need A staff to work on a private server with me, The site and everything else is set up! Positions available: 5
Forums: Administrators: 0 Jr. Admins: 1 or 2 Super moderators: 3 Moderators: 3
Server: Admins: 3 Mods: 4 Hosters: 2 Coders: any
I have been very successful and am looking to keep it that way. The forum is located at http://runererevelation.ipbfree.com/index.php?act=idx
I need as much help as possible, thanks. Edit: Staff will get part of donations!!! -Tyler
